channel.title: Maps on Journalism with R
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on Journalism with R

item.title: Static maps
item.description: In this section we’re going to go over the basics of spatial data, shape files, and various ways to map Census data. Spatial data can be difficult to wrap your head around at first. I’ll describe it briefly as best I can before we move on to how journalists use it in their work process. But I hope you’ll look up more details later on as you come to appreciate it more.
